data.title: Roger O'Donnell
data.text:
I am currently the Head of Data & Analytics (D&A), Audit for both KPMG International and KPMG LLP (US) and lead the global development and execution of the firm’s strategy in using data and analytics in the audit practice. I work with KPMG’s global data and analytic leaders from across KPMG’s network of member firms to identify and help audit teams create new capabilities in using data and analytics to improve audit quality and effectiveness. I currently serve as the lead audit engagement partner for several of KPMG’s multinational clients. I have worked with clients on mergers and acquisitions, initial public offerings and various registration filings. I also have extensive experience in addressing significant financial reporting and accounting issues and matters with clients and the US Securities and Exchange Commission.

Prior to my current responsibilities, I was the industry leader for the New York Consumer and Industrial Markets practice for KPMG LLP in the US.
